nodes.text: Captain Elson was a Human male who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Stationed on Hoth, he and Captain Arden informed a Republic spacer that an Imperial transport, which held two SIS agents captive, was recently shot down until an escape pod was launched out. They believed that the agents hid vital information so they send the spacer to find them.
